StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_GetMUDImportInfo]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@Type varchar(1)
AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
SET @TYPE = UPPER(@Type)
IF @TYPE = 'N' BEGIN --- Get new zips SELECT MN.ZIP, MR.REGION_ID, MR.DIST_ID, MR.REGION_NAME, MR.DIST_NAME FROM MUD_NEW_ZIPCODES MN INNER JOIN MUD_REGIONS MR ON MN.FIPS = MR.FIPS AND MN.NOTIFY_FLAG = 0
/* SELECT MN.ZIP, MR.REGION_ID, MR.DIST_ID FROM MUD_NEW_ZIPCODES MN, MUD_REGIONS MR WHERE MN.FIPS = MR.FIPS AND NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MUD_FILE MF WHERE MF.ZIP = MN.ZIP) */
END
IF @TYPE = 'A' BEGIN --- Get zips to be archived SELECT MA.ZIP, MR.REGION_ID, MR.DIST_ID, MR.REGION_NAME, MR.DIST_NAME FROM MUD_ARCHIVED_ZIPCODES MA, MUD_REGIONS MR ---MA.FIPS = MR.FIPS AND ---MA.NOTIFY_FLAG = 0 WHERE MA.FIPS = MR.FIPS AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM MUD_FILE MF WHERE MF.ZIP = MA.ZIP AND MF.STATUS_ID IN ('A','I')) END
IF @TYPE = 'R' BEGIN --- Get zips to be re-ac.vated SELECT MV.ZIP, MR.REGION_ID, MR.DIST_ID, MR.REGION_NAME, MR.DIST_NAME FROM MUD_REACTIVATE_ZIPCODES MV INNER JOIN MUD_REGIONS MR ON MV.FIPS = MR.FIPS AND MV.NOTIFY_FLAG = 0 END
SET NOCOUNT OFF
